Gratitude.answer: You're welcome! If you have any other questions, feel free to ask.

Business Hours.answer: Renato's Place Private Resort and Events is open 24/7 but the office Hours is 8:00am to 5:00pm only.

questions: Can I get a refund if I cancel
How do I reschedule my booking
Cancellation.answer: Strictly no cancellation or non-refundable. Clients may reschedule the event free of charge up to 30 days before the event date, provided the new date is available. Rescheduling within 30 days of the original date incurs a 20% charge.

questions: What are the terms and conditions
House Rules.answer:
House Rules, Terms and Conditions for Pool Option and Renato's Hall

When you book accommodation or services at Renato's Private Resort & Events Place, you agree to the following terms and conditions:

• A 50% deposit of the contract price or PHP 10,000 is required for reservation. First come, first served basis policy.

• Strictly no cancellation or non-refundable.

• Balance must be settled 1 week before the event date.

• Clients may reschedule the event free of charge up to 30 days before the event date, provided the new date is available.

• Rescheduling within 30 days of the original date incurs a 20% charge.

• Additional PHP 150.00 per head for groups exceeding 25 Pax.

• Extra charge for overtime use: PHP 1,500.00 per hour or part thereof.

• Php 3,000 for security deposit to be returned within 5 days after the event.

• The client must ensure their guests follow all policies.

• The management reserves the right to cancel the booking if the client violates any policies or regulations.

• No fireworks, confetti, or open flames allowed.

• The management is not responsible for any loss or damage to personal property.

questions: Do I need to pay a deposit
When should I pay the deposit
When must the deposit be paid
Deposit.answer: A deposit of 50% is required at the time of booking. The remaining balance is due 7 days prior to arrival.
